transcript:

Hello
Hello
Hello
Hello
Customer: Ah sir vanakkam sir.
Executive: Vanakkam sir sollunga sir.
Customer: Sir India martla irunthu call panniruken sir saran.
Executive: Sollunga sir sollunga sir.
Customer: Sir busyingala illa pesalaangala?
Executive: Sollunga sir.
Customer: Ah enna sir last time pesumpothe naan sollirunthe naan last time use use andha alavukku illa sir abindradhu maari sollirunthe.
Executive: Aama aama aama sir.
Customer: Enna achu sir ippo marubadiyum adhe maari thaan irukkudhu nalla use pannittu thaan sir irundhinga naduvula enna achu?
Executive: Aama sir konjam velaigal adhikkamaayidchu konjam ange inge pogavendiyadhula velaigal konjam adhikkamaayidchna udane appdiye idhaayittu enakku andha idhu option varamaatingge.
Executive: Ore nimisham irunga enna ungalukku varalannu solreenga.
Customer: Lead managerkulla irukkuradhu vandhu enakku innum varamaatingge andha idhu andha lead managera?
Executive: Leads ah unga phone actually unga mobilela irundhu neenga India mart app yethittan idhukku apparam neenga yenkitteye pesunga mamta pesa venaam abindradhu maari sonningge mamum rendu perume idhu kondu maari varanumla veetukulla varadhu andha numberla varanum sir varum sir varum sir thaaralama varum sir varlaiye adhaan varalainggala aama andha idhe varlaiye.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Check pandrennga ennaadhu ennaadhu nu paakren.
Customer: Check pannittu kooda irundhaa pona varave naan complaint sollirundhen idhe idhu adhaavadhu ennaadhu unga idhula open aagala abindrattu.
Executive: Open aagala open aagudhu andha number varamaatinggudhu.
Customer: Enna number varamaatinggudhu sir puriyala avangaludaiya contact number.
Executive: Contact pannala sir adhu varum sir neenga contact panni lead managerla kaattum lead managerla kaattum sir.
Customer: Illaiye adhu number namma idhu namma idhu research pannaa thaan varudhu varai mattumbadi varamaatingge.
Executive: Sir namma lead eduthomna thaan ungalukku avanga number kaattum.
Customer: Sari thaan sir andha contact neenga rendu rendu idhu idhu kooda varanumla.
Executive: Enna sir enquiry calls ah sir enquiry rendu varumla sir enquiry rendaa moonaa poduveenggala sir.
Executive: Sir adhu lead sir bylead sir adhu bylead podureenggala sir.
Customer: Aama sir adhe adhe vandhu nammalukku contact panna mudiyalaiye.
Executive: Contact panna mudiyala enakku andha number varamaatingge.
Executive: Sir oru nimisham irunga sir oru nimisham irunga sir.
Executive: Sir adhu number vandhu paatheenggana ippo oru examplekku ippa hello sollunga sir.
Executive: Sir ippo oru examplekku neenga oru coconutkaaga contact buyer now abindrattu neenga oru lead consume pandreenggana andha leedoda details firstleye kaattum adha open panningale ungalukku call option kaattum andha call option click pannina thaan ungalukku call connect aagum.
Customer: Call option vandhu perumbaal vandhu India mart India mart thaan sir varudhu namma call pannalum avangaludaiya number varamaatingge.
Executive: Adhaan adhu appdi thaan sir pogum oru nimisham neenga pesuninggana thaan avangaloda number ungalukku varum neenga callla porappa paatheenggana India mart buyer thaan ungalukku call pogum aama call option thaan neenga connect aaganum.
Customer: Sari neenga avanga number vaangalaamla sir.
Executive: Adhaan sir oru oru nimisham neenga avangakitta pesanum sir.
Customer: Ah pesuninggana thaan avangaloda actual number ennaadhu abindradhu ungalukku smsla varum andha paintoda nameoda ungalukku smsla varum.
Customer: Smsle kaattumaattingge maille kaattumaattingge smsle yen kaattumaattingge idhu only India mart number thaan varudhu adhaan solren.
Executive: Adhu thaan sir appdi thaan sir neenga contact buyer nu koduthu neenga oru nimisham avanga attend panni neenga pesunaa mattum thaan ungaloda numbere avangalukku pogum original number.
Customer: Sari sari sari sari.
Executive: Puriyudhinggala ungaloda original number at least neenga oru nimisham neenga pesuninggana thaan unga number avangalukku pogum avanga number ungalukku varum.
Customer: Hmm illa naan pesiruken vaangiruken numberla vaangiruken aanaa ippo oru konja naalaave number idhaaga maatingge varamaatingge.
Executive: Adhu thaan sir namma sidele neenga at least oru oru nimisham neenga pesuninggana mattum thaan ungalukku connect aagum unga number ungalukku kidaikkum adhe maari unga number avangalukku pogum.
Customer: Sari sari sari sari ippo sir ippo oru rendu lead mattum konjam consume pandreenggala India mart app konjam open pannunga open pannunga naan eppdi irukkunnu solren open pannungala.
Customer: Sir open panna sollunga.
Executive: Ah adhu la A grade semi husked coconut abindru oru lead vandhirukku paarunga first one.
Customer: Irukkeenggala?
Customer: Varalaiye sir enakku varave illaiye adhu.
Executive: Sari ippo ungalukku enna lead kaattudhingge sir kadasiyaa vandhu lead manager adhe enakku kaamikaliye varave illaiye andha optionne illaiye.
Executive: Sir irukkum sir India mart applaoda neenga bylead edukkireenga India martla irukken lead managerke illaiye okay sir oru nimisham oru nimisham sir enakku irukkuradhula search post message home idhaan naalu thaan irukku.
Executive: Sir sari sir naan adhu ungalukku adhu ungalukku eppdi irukkudhunna neenga vandhu oru requirement post pandra maari irukkudhu neenga oru buyerra irukkura maari ungalukku ange kaattudhu sariinggala neenga ippo enna pannunga abindinnaa andha mamoda mobilela vachirukkeenggalla adha logout pannittu ungaloda mobilela login pannunga.
Customer: Rendu perai connect panna maari irukkaadhaa irukkalaamla.
Executive: Sir edhaavadhu onnu thaan sir onnu thaan sir panna mudiyum actually adhu thaan procedure onnu thaan pandra maari irukkum.
Customer: Sari sari rendennu sonnaappleye neengale oru thadava neengale vera yaaro sonna maari irukkeenggale rendu perunaalum pesikkalaam abindrattu.
Executive: Illa illa illa sir illa illa onnu thaan sir naan thaan ungalukku sonnen onnu thaan startingla irundhu naan thaan ungalukku pesittu irukken.
Customer: Aama avar Joseph sarum pesunaanla adhaan appa enakku maathinaa thaan sir unga irukkeenggala.
Executive: Aama sir aama.
Customer: Adhukku naalaagumaa alladhu adhe idhula maathanumaa?
Executive: Sir adhu neengale change pannikkalaam sir sir adhu romba adhu easy thaan sir neenga ange andha mobile login logout pannittu idhula login pannikkonga unga mobile numbera pottu avvalodhaan.
Customer: Sari sari sari sari.
Executive: Adhu enakku konjam konjam naal kalichu naan pannikkalaannu paarthen oru oru moonu maasam kalichaa pannikkalaannu paarthen.
Executive: Sir appdinaa appdinaa neenga leede use panna mudiyadhingge.
Customer: Hmm sari sari sari.
Customer: Sari naan pannidren sir logout pannittu ingge kondu varanum appdi thaan.
Executive: Aama sari sir veetla sollirundhen naan pannikkidren andha maari avanga sollirundhaanga.
Executive: Sari naan solren naan solren adhu thaan sir ippa naan neenga solra maari ippa neenga adhu pannitteengganaalum neenga vandhu naan ungalukku sonnen paatheenggala ungalukku directaa vara calls and enquirieslaam vandhu neenga konjam plan upgrade panninaa ungalukku konjam betteraa varum abindradhu maari sollirundhen neenga enna sollirundhingge abindinnaa konjam enakku oru oru maasam venum abindradhu maari sollirundhingge naan adhanaala thaan naduvula ungalukku pesave illai so ippo kooda paatheengge abindinnaa oru 15 naal mattukku pesuninggele adhu thaan sir adhu ungalukku offer eligibility irundhadhunaala pesirundhen ippayume paatheengge abindinnaa oru offer onnu koduthurukkaanga adhaavadhu 75000 neenga total price sariinggala but aanaa namma sidele vandhu oru neenga andha oru moonu maasam neenga use pannirukkaradhunaala namma India mart sidele irundhu oru 10000kku 10 to 12000 ungalukku reduce panni remaining irukkura amount ungalukku adjustment panni ungalukku oru ungaloda catalog vandhu oru business category levelkku oru India martla oru own website servicela ungalukku run panni tharenndradhu maari naan pesirundhen so adhu paatheengge abindinnaa innumum eligiblela thaan irukkeengge unga catalog abindradhu adhanaala thaan naan ungalukku konjam naal aagum sir moonu maasam aagalaam oru vela aaru maasam kooda aagalaam naane idhu pannuven sir.
Executive: Sari sari okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving leads in lead manager.

- Customer is not getting contact numbers.

- Wants to know if he can use leads on two devices.



Resolution:

- Executive explains how to get contact numbers.

- Executive clarified only one device can be used.

- Executive explains how to log in on new device.

- Executive explains offer to upgrade plan.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will log out and log in on new device.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, contact number, login, app, upgrade
